name: Interdisciplinary Drawing Concepts
description: Interdisciplinary Drawing Concepts will extend drawing into a range of other media, allowing students to explore the sculptural, temporal and performative potential of mark-making.
prerequisites: [VPHA46H3 and VPSB74H3] and [0.5 credit at the B-level in Studio courses]; students enrolled in the Specialist and Major programs in Studio must also complete ACMB01H3
